medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 7 days ago and have progressed with diffuse abdominal pain described as pressure and burning all over. The patient has not had a bowel movement for 7 days, despite an enema. He reports vomiting 3 times in the past 3 days and has experienced chills. He denies fevers.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diabetes mellitus, Osteoarthritis, Depression, Hypertension, Hyperlipidemia, Anxiety
medical_history.family_history: Diabetes mellitus in sister; father and mother both died of heart disease.
